title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams

courseOutline.title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
courseOutline.description: A comprehensive guide for new remote tech employees to effectively use Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
courseOutline.goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
courseOutline.audience: New remote tech employees who are unfamiliar with Microsoft Teams but have basic computer skills.

sections.title: Introduction to Microsoft Teams
sections.description: Overview of the interface and navigation

sections.title: Scheduling and Participating in Video Calls
sections.description: How to schedule meetings and join calls

sections.title: Integrating Microsoft Teams with Other Applications
sections.description: Connecting Teams to other productivity tools
